name: rapid7-insightappsec
description: Integrate Azure DevOps with Rapid7 InsightAppSec in order to perform application scans as part of build and release tasks.
author: rapid7

inputs.name: apiConnection
inputs.label: InsightAppSec Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the InsightAppSec instance to perform API calls.

inputs.name: application
inputs.label: Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of applications for scanning.

inputs.name: scanConfig
inputs.label: Scan Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The configuration you want to apply during the scan.

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait for scan completion?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option to wait for the scan to complete before continuing to the next task.

inputs.name: scanCheckInterval
inputs.label: Scan Status Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: The frequency for checking the current scan status (in minutes).

inputs.name: generateFindingsReport
inputs.label: Generate findings report?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option for generating a raw JSON report containing all findings from a completed scan.

inputs.name: hasTimeout
inputs.label: Fail scan on timeout?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option for setting a timeout for the scan that is launched.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum amount of time (in minutes) the scan is allowed to run before cancelling.

inputs.name: hasScanGating
inputs.label: Scan Gating
inputs.helpMarkDown: Option for implementing a vulnerability query to enforce scan gating.

inputs.name: vulnQuery
inputs.label: Vulnerability Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the scan results contain vulnerabilities that match this query, then the task will fail.

validation.message: Double quote (") is an invalid character, use single quote (').
